name: Marine
description:
The imperial pharmacist is testing his new agent on Marines. Players as marines are going to fight to survive. When players get 300 points, the pharmacist will send one of his elite soldier into the battleground, and when players reach 1500 points, they are going to face a gene modified Hydralisk along with mimics. Victory comes after you beat the Hydralisk.

    Use “W” “S” “A” “D” to control marine, and press mouse to shoot.
